remarks: Collection Principle.  This remarkable theorem scheme is in effect a very strong generalization of the Axiom of Replacement.  The proof makes use of Scott's trick ~ scottex that collapses a proper class into a set of minimum rank.  The wff ` ph ` can be thought of as ` ph ( x , y ) ` .  Scheme "Collection Principle" of [Jech] p. 72. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2003.)
